app.title: AI Career Counseling Tool
app.subtitle: Discover Your Perfect Career Path
app.description: AI-powered career guidance tailored for Indian students based on NEP 2020 guidelines

academicInfo.title: Academic Information
academicInfo.description: Share your academic interests and performance

interests.label: Areas of Interest
interests.error: Please select at least one interest
interests.helpText: Choose subjects or fields that genuinely interest you

favoriteSubjects.label: Favorite Subjects
favoriteSubjects.helpText: Subjects you enjoy studying the most

difficultSubjects.label: Challenging Subjects
difficultSubjects.helpText: Subjects you struggle with or find challenging

socioeconomicInfo.title: Background Information
socioeconomicInfo.description: Help us understand your background for better recommendations

familyBackground.label: Family Background
familyBackground.helpText: Brief description of your family's educational and professional background

economicFactors.label: Economic Factors
economicFactors.error: Please select at least one economic factor
economicFactors.helpText: Factors that describe your family's economic situation

householdSize.label: Household Size
householdSize.helpText: Total number of people living in your household

internetAccess.label: Internet Access
internetAccess.yes: Yes, I have regular internet access
internetAccess.no: No, limited or no internet access

deviceAccess.label: Device Access
deviceAccess.helpText: Devices you have access to for learning

aspirations.title: Career Aspirations
aspirations.description: Share your career goals and preferences

preferredCareers.label: Preferred Career Fields
preferredCareers.helpText: Career areas you're considering or interested in

preferredLocations.label: Preferred Work Locations
preferredLocations.helpText: Cities or regions where you'd like to work

constraints.title: Constraints & Considerations
constraints.description: Help us understand any limitations or considerations

financialConstraints.label: Financial Constraints
financialConstraints.no: No, finances are not a major constraint

locationConstraints.label: Location Constraints
locationConstraints.helpText: Places where you cannot study or work

familyExpectations.label: Family Expectations
familyExpectations.helpText: Career expectations or preferences from your family

timeConstraints.label: Time Constraints
timeConstraints.helpText: Need to start earning soon, family responsibilities, etc.

validation.invalidGender: Please select a valid gender option
validation.invalidFamilyBackground: Please provide a brief description of your family background

validation.invalidDeviceAccess: Please select at least one device you have access to
validation.invalidHouseholdSize: Household size must be between 1 and 20

suggestions.required: This field is required to continue.
suggestions.maxLength: Please enter no more than {{max}} characters.
suggestions.email: Please enter a valid email address (e.g., user@example.com).
suggestions.phone: Please enter a valid phone number (e.g., +91 9876543210).
suggestions.pattern: Please check the format of your input.
suggestions.age: Please enter a valid age between 10 and 25.
suggestions.name: Use only letters and spaces in your name.
suggestions.location: Enter your city and state (e.g., Mumbai, Maharashtra).
suggestions.familyBackground: Briefly describe your family's educational and professional background.
suggestions.selectOne: Please select one option from the list.
suggestions.selectMultiple: You can select multiple options that apply to you.

results.title: Your Career Recommendations
results.subtitle: Based on your profile, here are the top career matches

noResults.title: No Recommendations Found
noResults.message: We couldn't find suitable career recommendations based on your profile.
noResults.suggestion: Try updating your interests or academic information for better matches.

analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard
analytics.subtitle: Insights and trends in career choices

errors.generic: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.validation: Please check the form for errors and correct them.
errors.server: Server error. Please try again later.
errors.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again.
errors.maxRetriesReached: Maximum retry attempts reached. Please try again later.

ai.unavailable: AI service is temporarily unavailable. Please try again in a few minutes.
ai.processing: Error processing your request with AI. Please try again.
ai.quota: AI service quota exceeded. Please try again later.
ai.timeout: AI processing is taking longer than expected. Please try again.
ai.invalidResponse: Received invalid response from AI service. Please try again.
ai.fallback: AI service is unavailable. Using fallback recommendations.

database.connection: Database connection error. Please try again.
database.query: Error retrieving data from database. Please try again.

form.submissionFailed: Form submission failed. Please check your inputs and try again.
form.validationFailed: Please correct the highlighted errors before submitting.
form.networkError: Unable to submit form due to network issues. Please check your connection.
form.serverError: Server error during form submission. Please try again later.
form.timeout: Form submission timed out. Please try again.

loading.timeout: Loading is taking longer than expected. Please refresh the page.
loading.failed: Failed to load content. Please try again.
